list_definition.definition: the state of being united or in agreement

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: When will men learn to live in unity with each other?

list_definition.definition: singleness, or the state of being one complete whole

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Unity of design in his pictures is this artist’s main aim.

list_definition.definition: something arranged to form a single complete whole

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This play is not a unity, but a series of unconnected scenes.
